pages.text: Alex's Delight adds new food recipes to Minecraft, using ingredients sourced from the Alex's Mobs mod. $(br2)Combine exotic meats and plants to create delicious and unique dishes.

Start by gathering ingredients like Kangaroo or Bison Meat. $(br2)Using a Cutting Board and Knife, they can be broken down into usable cuts of meat. $(br2)Use them to craft new recipes like Kangaroo Stew, Bison Burgers, and more.
